long_description: The Terry Liberator Y saddle for men is ergonomically sculpted to relieve pressure in key areas and has plenty of padding for added comfort during long rides. Sculpted shape and cut-out provide support for the sit bones while relieving pressure on soft tissue areas. Leather cover with generous foam padding for comfort, good looks and durability; sturdy alloy rail construction.
short_description: The Terry Liberator Y saddle for men is ergonomically sculpted to relieve pressure in key areas and has plenty of padding for added comfort during long rides.
